sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-aside width="200px" class="aside">
        <el-radio-group v-model="isCollapse" style="margin-bottom: 20px; width: 60px;">
            <el-radio-button :value="false"><el-icon><Open /></el-icon></el-radio-button>
            <el-radio-button :value="true"><el-icon><TurnOff /></el-icon></el-radio-button>
        </el-radio-group>
        <el-menu style="width:200px" default-active="2" class="el-menu-vertical-demo" :collapse="isCollapse" @open="handleOpen"
            @close="handleClose">
            <el-sub-menu index="1">
                
            </el-sub-menu>
            <el-menu-item index="2">
                <el-icon><icon-menu /></el-icon>
                <template #title>Navigator Two</template>
            </el-menu-item>
            <el-menu-item index="3" disabled>
                <el-icon>
                    <document />
                </el-icon>
                <template #title>Navigator Three</template>
            </el-menu-item>
            <el-menu-item index="4">
                <el-icon>
                    <setting />
                </el-icon>
                <template #title>Navigator Four</template>
            </el-menu-item>
        </el-menu>
    </el-aside>
</template>
<script>
import { ref } from 'vue'

export default {
    setup() {
        let isCollapse = ref(true)
        function handleClose() {
            isCollapse = false;
        }
        function handleOpen() {
            isCollapse = true;
        }
        return {
            isCollapse,
            handleClose,
            handleOpen
        }
    },
}
</script>
<style>
.el-menu-vertical-demo:not(.el-menu--collapse) {
    width: 200px;
    min-height: 400px;
}
</style>
